video_info.title: Indian Idol
video_info.shortDescription: Indian Idol 16 – “Yaadon Ki Playlist” celebrates music that brings back cherished memories and emotions. For the first time ever, auditions go outdoors, traveling across India to discover raw talent, hosted by the legendary Udit Narayan, while Aditya Narayan returns as the main host. The judges - Vishal Dadlani, Shreya Ghoshal, and Badshah - search for voices that touch hearts. A season where every song is a memory, and every melody tells a story.
video_info.longDescription: Indian Idol 16 – “Yaadon Ki Playlist” celebrates music that brings back cherished memories and emotions. For the first time ever, auditions go outdoors, traveling across India to discover raw talent, hosted by the legendary Udit Narayan, while Aditya Narayan returns as the main host. The judges - Vishal Dadlani, Shreya Ghoshal, and Badshah - search for voices that touch hearts. A season where every song is a memory, and every melody tells a story.

video_info.title: Pro Wrestling League 2026
video_info.shortDescription: Tigers of Mumbai Dangals gear up for a big showdown as they take on the Maharashtra Kesari in a high‑energy league clash. With top wrestlers and Olympic‑level talent on both sides, fans can expect fast moves, big points, and nonstop action. A crucial matchup in the race for the knockouts. Tune in to catch all the action from Pro Wrestling League 2026, LIVE on Sony LIV.

video_info.title: Bundesliga 2025-26
video_info.shortDescription: VfB Stuttgart hosts Union Berlin Stuttgart sit in the top four with 32 points from 17 games, pushing hard for Champions League. Union are ninth on 23 points, hovering around the European-chasing pack but lacking consistency in results. Find out as we bring you all the action, LIVE on Sony LIV.

video_info.title: Bundesliga 2025-26
video_info.shortDescription: FC Augsburg host SC Freiburg at the WWK Arena in a mid-table Bundesliga clash. Augsburg’s home record in the head-to-head is more balanced, giving this a tight, cagey feel. Expect Augsburg to press aggressively and look for direct transitions, while Freiburg aim for structured buildup and wide overloads. Find out as we bring you all the action, LIVE on Sony LIV.
video_info.longDescription: FC Augsburg host SC Freiburg at the WWK Arena in a mid-table Bundesliga clash.
